Aashirvad Banquet Hall

Where Traditions Meet Luxury

Experience the grandeur of Indian celebrations in a modern, elegant setting. Perfect for weddings, receptions, and all special occasions in Nurpur, Himachal Pradesh.

Book Your Event

About Us

Aashirvad Banquet Hall is a family-owned venue in Nurpur, Himachal Pradesh, where traditional Indian hospitality meets modern luxury. Our mission is to create unforgettable celebrations, blending timeless elegance with contemporary amenities. With decades of experience, we pride ourselves on personalized service, exquisite décor, and attention to every detail.

Whether it’s a grand wedding, intimate gathering, or corporate event, our team ensures every occasion is memorable. Discover the perfect blend of culture, comfort, and sophistication at Aashirvad Banquet Hall.

Venue Highlights

Main Banquet Hall

Spacious, elegant hall with luxurious décor and modern amenities.

Open Lawns

Beautifully landscaped lawns for outdoor events and ceremonies.

Stage & Décor Setup

Customizable stage and décor for weddings, receptions, and more.

Lighting & Ambience

Premium lighting and ambiance to set the perfect mood.

Guest Rooms

Comfortable, well-appointed rooms for guests and family.

Parking Space

Ample parking for guests with security and convenience.
